messages.zh: 4-7 各取所需（上）
messages.en: 4-7 Take What You Need (part 1)

messages.zh: 这里......倒下的都是些整合运动。
messages.en: This place……have Reunion Movement lying all around.

messages.zh: ......这个，伤口流出的血液冻成了冰渣，其他部分却很完好。
messages.en: ……This one, the blood from the wound are frozen into shards of ice, but the other parts are intact.

messages.zh: 确实是霜叶的技巧。
messages.en: This is indeed Frostleaf’s skill.

messages.zh: ——那边的废墟，应该是爆炸导致的。
messages.en: ——The ruin over there, should be caused by an explosion.

messages.zh: 应该是陨星炸出来的没错。
messages.en: That should be Meteorite’s work.
(Frostleaf……Jessica……Meteorite……they, must still be……)

messages.zh: 阿米娅，各救援小队都已抵达罗德岛、
messages.en: Amiya, the rescue teams have returned to Rhodes Island.

messages.zh: 我们救出了除了陨星她们以外的所有侦查小队。
messages.en: We have rescued every scout team other than Meteorite’s.

messages.zh: 没有干员在任务中牺牲。但相应的——
messages.en: No operators were killed in the mission. But respectively——

messages.zh: 所有人都有不同程度的冻伤。
messages.en: Everyone suffered frostbites to different extents.

messages.zh: 你要重视这点。
messages.en: You need to pay attention to this.
……Frostbites?

messages.zh: 所有侦查小队都指出，分城中徘徊着一些特殊的整合运动成员。
messages.en: All the rescue teams pointed out, there are some unusual Reunion Movement members wandering in the sub city.

messages.zh: 他们有着特殊的作战方式，完全不同于常规整合运动成员暴露出的盲动主义战术。
messages.en: They have unique styles of combat, entirely different from the blind tactics that ordinary Reunion Movement members show.

messages.zh: 多加小心。
messages.en: Do take care.
I……I understand.

messages.zh: Dr.{@nickname}，你也明白吧？
messages.en: Dr.___, you understand as well right?

messages.zh: 明白
messages.en: I understand

messages.zh: 那就好。
messages.en: Good.

messages.zh: 我也要去做一些事情了。
messages.en: I have to be onto my own affairs now.

messages.zh: 阿米娅，就算Dr.{@nickname}很有用，也别太过依靠一个人。
messages.en: Amiya, even though Dr.___ is very helpful, don’t rely too much on someone.

messages.zh: 还有，注意戒指。
messages.en: And, pay attention to your rings.

messages.zh: 我知道。
messages.en: I know.

messages.zh: 其实凯尔希医生也很担心你的。
messages.en: Dr.Kal’tsit actually cares a lot about you.

messages.zh: 不知不觉中——
messages.en: While we weren’t aware——

messages.zh: 危险的野兽露出他们的利爪了。
messages.en: The beasts have shown their claws.

messages.zh: 退路已经被整合运动切断
messages.en: The retreat route has been cut off by Reunion Movement

messages.zh: 嗯......他们非常想要阻止我们撤退呢。
messages.en: Yeah……they really want to stop us from retreating.

messages.zh: 然而，我们来到这里的目的，从来都不是逃跑。
messages.en: However, we were never here to run away.

messages.zh: 罗德岛，冲破他们的防线。
messages.en: Rhodes Island, charge their defenses!

messages.zh: 让我们把陨星她们救回来！
messages.en: Let’s take Meteorite’s squad back!

messages.zh: 红，听得见吗？
messages.en: Projekt Red, can you hear?

messages.zh: 啊啊，对。
messages.en: Ahh, yes.

messages.zh: 没错。在贫民区东入口处会合。
messages.en: That’s right. Meet at the east entrance of the slum.

messages.zh: 嗯。就我们两个。
messages.en: Right. Just the two of us.

messages.zh: 没问题的。对付整合运动，我们两个已经足够了。
messages.en: It’s okay. Against Reunion Movement, the two of us are enough.
